text: Myristica succadanea is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is a tree endemic to the Maluku Islands in Indonesia. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica succadanea. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. title: Myristica succadanea
